Stick to smaller images; larger ones may overwhelm your small frame.Tips of wearing Karen Millen Outlet Maxi Dresses:The shoes you wear depend on the length of your dress. Some maxis are longer than others. I would recommend when shopping for a maxi dress take a pair of flip flops and a pair of flip flops with a heel or wedge to avoid a frumpy look. If the dress is three in . above the ankle wear a cute pair of flip flops or ballet shoes. For a longer maxi, wedges or flip flops with a heel. You do not want clothing to get to the ground. Plus you want to show your pretty pedicure.Piece of cake in your midsection with a belt, if the dress has too much volume.Wear large jewelry and carry an oversized bag to maximize the style. For instance, you can wear big hoops, lots of anklet bracelets on one arm along with perhaps a long necklace. You could even wear an ankle diamond.Wear a single-color dress to manufacture a sleek and smooth look. Skip the patterns and bold images of the maxi dress altogether with a bold color for spring. Top color choices include aqua, blue, purple, yellow and even bright red.Karen Millen UK can be worn to the grocery store or dinner with friends. But what you wear with the maxi dress is so important!
